footer.companyDescription: Your trusted partner for premium supplement manufacturing, packaging, and delivery.
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and industry insights.

hero.title: From Idea to Finished Supplement
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for premium supplement manufacturing, packaging, and delivery with uncompromising quality.

about.title: Quality Manufacturing for Premium Supplements
about.description: With over two decades of experience, Mondial Pack has established itself as a leader in supplement manufacturing. Our state-of-the-art facilities and expert team ensure that your products meet the highest standards of quality and efficacy.
about.subDescription: We pride ourselves on our attention to detail, commitment to sustainability, and innovative approach to supplement production.

process.title: Our Five-Step Process
process.subtitle: We've perfected our supplement manufacturing process to ensure quality at every stage.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.description: Careful selection of premium quality raw materials

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Rigorous testing of all raw materials

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: From formulation to finished product, we offer comprehensive solutions in various formats and packaging options.

capsules.title: Capsules
capsules.description: Hard-shell capsules in various sizes and materials, including vegetarian options. Custom printing and filling capabilities.

tablets.title: Tablets
tablets.description: Compressed tablets with precise dosing, various shapes and coatings. Specialized in both immediate and controlled release.

powders.title: Powders
powders.description: High-quality powder blends with excellent flow properties. Custom particle size distribution and mixing capabilities.

gummies.title: Gummies & Soft Chews
gummies.description: Delicious gummies and soft chews with precise dosing. Custom shapes, flavors, and textures available.

liquids.title: Liquids & Sprays
liquids.description: Liquid formulations and spray solutions with precise dosing. Specialized in both water and oil-based products.

sachets.title: Sachets & Stick Packs
sachets.description: Single-dose sachets and stick packs for powders and granules. Custom sizes and materials available.

aboutMondialPack.title: About Mondial Pack
aboutMondialPack.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience, we've established ourselves as a leader in nutraceutical manufacturing, combining cutting-edge technology with pharmaceutical-grade quality standards.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Over two decades of expertise in nutraceutical manufacturing

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Rigorous quality control and testing at every stage of production

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: State-of-the-art facilities and continuous process improvement

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Collaborative approach to meet your unique product requirements

processFlow.title: Our Value Chain
processFlow.subtitle: From raw materials to finished products, we handle every step of the process with expertise and care.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.description: Strategic procurement of high-quality raw materials and ingredients from trusted suppliers worldwide.

mixing.title: Mixing
mixing.description: Precise formulation and blending of ingredients using state-of-the-art mixing technology.

production.title: Production
production.description: Advanced manufacturing processes ensuring consistent quality and optimal efficiency.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: Custom packaging solutions that protect your products and enhance brand presentation.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Reliable logistics and distribution services to get your products to market efficiently.

trust.title: Quality & Compliance
trust.subtitle: Our facilities and processes meet the highest standards in the industry.

cta.title: Ready to Bring Your Supplement Idea to Life?
cta.subtitle: Partner with Mondial Pack for end-to-end supplement manufacturing and packaging solutions.

kpi.title: Our Impact in Numbers
kpi.subtitle: Delivering quality supplements to millions of customers worldwide.

productInspiration.title: Product Inspiration
productInspiration.subtitle: Explore our diverse range of successful formulations and find inspiration for your next product

netherlands.title: Netherlands Headquarters
netherlands.description: Our main production facility in Enschede, equipped with state-of-the-art manufacturing capabilities.

spain.title: Spain Production Facility
spain.description: Our specialized facility in Alhaurín de la Torre, focused on high-volume production and distribution.
